key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny, particularly concerning anti-money laundering (AML) compliance and consumer protection laws

Economic sensitivity to regional downturns in the Midwest
Integration challenges from the acquisition of TCF Financial Corporation
controversies: Ongoing regulatory oversight and potential fines
Operational challenges from the TCF Financial Corporation acquisition
social_issues: Commitment to a $40 billion community lending and investment plan as part of ESG initiatives
